nodes.bodyText:
please add this FOR for (char item: vowels) { in some other example  to show that we violate it, but this option allow void violation.
Please do the same for all other allowXxxxxx cases. We need to show at least in default config that we violate such code.

Hello @romani i cannot add an example of foreach colon violation as the default config of ignoreEnhancedForColon is true.
Can u please elaborate on this a more
Sorry for the trouble

ok, in this case we need example of ignoreEnhancedForColon=false please do this all others that are ignored by default.
We need to show each property in action for activated and disabled mode, to let user see how behavior is changing then value of it is changing.
Ok I see it now in code for default.
we need in some othe rexample on above came catch to show violation on it.
@romani Do you want me to add this example in the default config too?
yes, please, but try to minimize try-catch block to not have extra code.
